channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Intel Driver & Support Assistant

item.title: CVE-2018-3621|2024-08-05T04:50:30.366Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20driver%20%26%20support%20assistant
item.description: Insufficient input validation in the Intel Driver & Support Assistant before 3.6.0.4 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via adjacent access.
